results.title: Association of Preadmission Metformin Use and Prognosis in Patients With Sepsis and Diabetes Mellitus: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: In contrast, the reports of Green et al. and Doenyas Bara et al. showed that preadmission @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ significantly lowered mortality compared with those not using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Li Y, Zhao H, Guo Y, Duan Y, Guo Y, Ding X. Association of Preadmission Metformin Use and Prognosis in Patients With Sepsis and Diabetes Mellitus: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2021;12():811776. PMID: 35002982

results.title: A Review on The Protective Effects of Metformin in Sepsis-Induced Organ Failure
results.text_hl: Studies reported the safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapeutic doses, with no evidence of @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: CELLULAR SENESCENCE IMPLICATED IN SEPSIS-INDUCED MUSCLE WEAKNESS AND AMELIORATED WITH METFORMIN.
results.text_hl: Muscle strength of @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ was improved upon @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

results.title: Lactic acidosis and severe septic shock in metformin users: a cohort study
results.text_hl: Though high @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ concentration indicates poor prognosis in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, mortality rate was found to be significantly lower in those who were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Association of preadmission metformin use and mortality in patients with sepsis and diabetes mellitus: a systematic review and meta-analysis of cohort studies
results.text_hl: However, some studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ cannot decrease but instead increases the mortality rate of @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ animals.

results.title: Metformin ameliorates sepsis-induced brain injury by inhibiting apoptosis, oxidative stress and neuroinflammation via the PI3K/Akt signaling pathway
results.text_hl: Previous studies have suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ provides neuroprotective effects against @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@, @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@brain trauma@@@ and other @DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@, but whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects a @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ brain remains unknown.

citations.NLM: Tang G, Yang H, Chen J, Shi M, Ge L, Ge X, Zhu G. Metformin ameliorates sepsis-induced brain injury by inhibiting apoptosis, oxidative stress and neuroinflammation via the PI3K/Akt signaling pathway Oncotarget. 2017 Nov 17;8(58):97977-97989. PMID: 29228667

results.title: AMP-Activated Protein Kinase and Glycogen Synthase Kinase 3beta Modulate the Severity of Sepsis-Induced Lung Injury.
results.text_hl: Improved survival in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ was correlated with preservation of mitochondrial complex V (ATP synthase) function and increased amounts of ETC complex III and IV.
